name: melody-auth
description: Melody Auth is an authentication service designed for SSO and user/token management. It supports OAuth2 and a minimal admin UI for managing users, apps, and permissions in self-hosted environments.
features: OAuth2 provider: Implement single sign-on for multiple applications with OAuth2 protocol support.
User management: Create and manage user accounts with profiles, passwords, and permissions.
Application registry: Register and configure OAuth2 client applications with redirect URIs and scopes.
Token management: Issue and validate access tokens and refresh tokens for authenticated sessions.
Permission system: Define and assign granular permissions to users and applications.
Admin interface: Manage users, applications, and permissions through a web-based admin panel.
Multi-factor authentication: Enhance security with TOTP-based two-factor authentication.
Session management: Track active user sessions and provide logout functionality.
Audit logging: Record authentication events and permission changes for security monitoring.
API access: Programmatically manage users and applications through REST API.
Custom branding: Customize login pages with your organization's logo and colors.
LDAP integration: Connect to existing LDAP directories for centralized user authentication.
